  16. (* Handling of dynamically-linked libraries *)

  18. ‌type dll_handle
  19. ‌type dll_address
  20. ‌type dll_mode = For_checking | For_execution

  22. external dll_open: string -> dll_handle = "caml_dynlink_open_lib"
  23. external dll_close: dll_handle -> unit = "caml_dynlink_close_lib"
  24. external dll_sym: dll_handle -> string -> dll_address
  25.                 = "caml_dynlink_lookup_symbol"
  26.          (* returned dll_address may be Val_unit *)
  27. external add_primitive: dll_address -> int = "caml_dynlink_add_primitive"
  28. external get_current_dlls: unit -> dll_handle array
  29.                                            = "caml_dynlink_get_current_libs"

  31. (* Current search path for DLLs *)
  32. ‌let search_path = ref ([] : string list)

  34. ‌type opened_dll =
  35.   | Checking of Binutils.t
  36.   | Execution of dll_handle

  38. ‌let dll_close = function
  39.   | Checking _ -> ()
  40.   | Execution dll -> dll_close dll

  42. (* DLLs currently opened *)
  43. ‌let opened_dlls = ref ([] : (string * opened_dll) list)

  45. (* Add the given directories to the search path for DLLs. *)
  46. ‌let add_path dirs =
  47.   search_path := dirs @ !search_path

  49. ‌let remove_path dirs =
  50.   search_path := List.filter (fun d -> not (List.mem d dirs)) !search_path

  52. (* Extract the name of a DLLs from its external name (xxx.so or -lxxx) *)

  54. let extract_dll_name file =
  55.   if Filename.check_suffix file Config.ext_dll then
  56.     Filename.chop_suffix file Config.ext_dll
  57.   else if String.length file >= 2 && String.sub file 0 2 = "-l" then
  58.     "dll" ^ String.sub file 2 (String.length file - 2)
  59.   else
  60.     file (* will cause error later *)

  62. (* Open a list of DLLs, adding them to opened_dlls.
  63.    Raise [Failure msg] in case of error. *)

  65. let open_dll mode name =
  66.   let name = name ^ Config.ext_dll in
  67. ‌  let fullname =
  68.     try
  69.       let fullname = Misc.find_in_path !search_path name in
  70.       if Filename.is_implicit fullname then
  71.         Filename.concat Filename.current_dir_name fullname
  72.       else fullname
  73.     with Not_found -> name in
  74.   match List.assoc_opt fullname !opened_dlls, mode with
  75.   | Some (Execution _), (For_execution | For_checking) -> ()
  76.   | Some (Checking _), For_checking -> ()
  77.   | None, For_checking ->
  78.       begin match Binutils.read fullname with
  79.       | Ok t -> opened_dlls := (fullname, Checking t) :: !opened_dlls
  80.       | Error err ->
  81.           failwith (fullname ^ ": " ^ Binutils.error_to_string err)
  82.       end
  83.   | (None | Some (Checking _) as current), For_execution ->
  84.       begin match dll_open fullname with
  85.       | dll ->
  86. ‌          let opened = match current with
  87.             | None -> List.remove_assoc fullname !opened_dlls
  88.             | Some _ -> !opened_dlls
  89.           in
  90.           opened_dlls := (fullname, Execution dll) :: opened
  91.       | exception Failure msg ->
  92.           failwith (fullname ^ ": " ^ msg)
  93.       end

  95. ‌let open_dlls mode names =
  96.   List.iter (open_dll mode) names

  98. (* Close all DLLs *)

  100. ‌let close_all_dlls () =
  101.   List.iter (fun (_, dll) -> dll_close dll) !opened_dlls;
  102.   opened_dlls := [];

  104. (* Find a primitive in the currently opened DLLs. *)

  106. type primitive_address =
  107.   | Prim_loaded of dll_address
  108.   | Prim_exists

  110. let find_primitive prim_name =
  111.   let rec find seen = function
  112.     [] ->
  113.       None
  114.   | (_,Execution dll) as curr :: rem ->
  115.       let addr = dll_sym dll prim_name in
  116.       if addr == Obj.magic () then find (curr :: seen) rem else begin
  117.         if seen <> [] then opened_dlls := curr :: List.rev_append seen rem;
  118.         Some (Prim_loaded addr)
  119.       end
  120.   | (_,Checking t) as curr :: rem ->
  121.       if Binutils.defines_symbol t prim_name then
  122.         Some Prim_exists
  123.       else
  124.         find (curr :: seen) rem
  125.   in
  126.   find [] !opened_dlls

  128. (* If linking in core (dynlink or toplevel), synchronize the VM
  129.    table of primitive with the linker's table of primitive
  130.    by storing the given primitive function at the given position
  131.    in the VM table of primitives.  *)

  133. ‌let linking_in_core = ref false

  135. ‌let synchronize_primitive num symb =
  136.   if !linking_in_core then begin
  137.     let actual_num = add_primitive symb in
  138.     assert (actual_num = num)
  139.   end

  141. (* Read the [ld.conf] file and return the corresponding list of directories *)

  143. let ld_conf_contents () =
  144.   let path = ref [] in
  145.   begin try
  146.     let ic = open_in (Filename.concat Config.standard_library "ld.conf") in
  147.     begin try
  148.       while true do
  149.         path := input_line ic :: !path
  150.       done
  151.     with End_of_file -> ()
  152.     end;
  153.     close_in ic
  154.   with Sys_error _ -> ()
  155.   end;
  156.   List.rev !path

  158. (* Split the CAML_LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable and return
  159.    the corresponding list of directories.  *)
  160. ‌let ld_library_path_contents () =
  161.   match Sys.getenv "CAML_LD_LIBRARY_PATH" with
  162.   | exception Not_found ->
  163.       []
  164.   | s ->
  165.       Misc.split_path_contents s

  167. (* Initialization for separate compilation *)

  169. ‌let init_compile nostdlib =
  170.   search_path :=
  171.     ld_library_path_contents() @
  172.     (if nostdlib then [] else ld_conf_contents())

  174. (* Initialization for linking in core (dynlink or toplevel) *)

  176. ‌let init_toplevel dllpaths =
  177.   search_path :=
  178.     ld_library_path_contents() @
  179.     dllpaths @
  180.     ld_conf_contents();
  181.   opened_dlls :=
  182.     List.map (fun dll -> "", Execution dll)
  183.       (Array.to_list (get_current_dlls()));
  184.   linking_in_core := true

  186. let reset () =
  187.   search_path := [];
  188.   opened_dlls :=[];
  189.   linking_in_core := false
